org.python.core.io

Class BinaryIOWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.python.core.io.IOBase
      • org.python.core.io.TextIOBase
        • org.python.core.io.BinaryIOWrapper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TextIOWrapper

    public class BinaryIOWrapper
extends TextIOBase
    A Buffered text stream in binary mode.
    Author:
    Philip Jenvey
